title: What He Desires
description: A complex proposal…His offer could save everything I’ve worked for. In exchange, he wants me in every way possible.An inescapable passion…His determination to win me over is undeniable. My desire to resist may not be enough to protect my heart.A connection that is more than it seems…He knows something I don’t. And when the dreams come, I’m left wondering if I’ve made the biggest mistake of my life.Note: This erotic romance is a novella and book 2 of 3. Not all situations are resolved. Ages 16-18+ depending on your location. Please read "For The Night (Luna, #1)" first!
author: Violet Haze
